medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal distension and right upper quadrant pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain was acute in onset at 2AM, with a severity of 8 out of 10. It was sharp and associated with back pain. Pain worsened when drinking shakes this morning. The patient also experienced lightheadedness, chills, and nausea starting at 11AM.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Diabetes type 2, Hyperlipidemia, Gastroesophageal reflux, Obstructive sleep apnea on CPAP, History of kidney stones, Osteoarthritis of the hips, knees and thumbs, Fatty liver, Colonic polyps (benign), History of iron deficiency anemia
